[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@svelte-put/toc](./toc.md) &gt; [TocObserveParameters](./toc.tocobserveparameters.md) &gt; [strategy](./toc.tocobserveparameters.strategy.md)

## TocObserveParameters.strategy property

strategy to observe matching toc elements.

- `'parent'` — observe the parent element of the matching toc element

- `'self'` — observe the matching toc element itself

- `'auto'` — attempt to compare matching toc element &amp; its parent `offsetHeight` with `window.innerHeight` to determine the best strategy.

Default to: `auto`

**Signature:**

```typescript
strategy?: 'parent' | 'self' | 'auto';
```

## Remarks

Alternatively, this can be override per element by setting the `data-toc-strategy` attribute on that element.
